Given a transaction hash, get the log

tx="0x59ff0d33333200adc2308ce2a482e0e17ca0d07701f79cf31bcc1804db41daee"
rpc=http://localhost:8545

```json
{
  "status": "0x1",
  "cumulativeGasUsed": "0x8911",
  "logs": [
    {
      "address": "0x5fbdb2315678afecb367f032d93f642f64180aa3",
      "topics": [
        // 第一个topic是Transfer事件的签名（topic0）
        "0xddf252ad1be2c89b69c2b068fc378daa952ba7f163c4a11628f55a4df523b3ef",
        // 第二个topic是from地址（topic1，转出方，ERC20事件里indexed参数）
        "0x0000000000000000000000003c44cdddb6a900fa2b585dd299e03d12fa4293bc",
        // 第三个topic是to地址（topic2，转入方，ERC20事件里indexed参数）
        "0x00000000000000000000000070997970c51812dc3a010c7d01b50e0d17dc79c8"
      ],
      "data": "0x00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001b1ae4d6e2ef500000",
      "blockHash": "0xbcb0261fed1dc95b86d5ed111aaf29af212ce1046841668278a72be11df2ce40",
      "blockNumber": "0x5",
      "blockTimestamp": "0x68877115",
      "transactionHash": "0x59ff0d33333200adc2308ce2a482e0e17ca0d07701f79cf31bcc1804db41daee",
      "transactionIndex": "0x0",
      "logIndex": "0x0",
      "removed": false
    }
  ],
  "logsBloom": "",
  "type": "0x2",
  "transactionHash": "0x59ff0d33333200adc2308ce2a482e0e17ca0d07701f79cf31bcc1804db41daee",
  "transactionIndex": "0x0",
  "blockHash": "0xbcb0261fed1dc95b86d5ed111aaf29af212ce1046841668278a72be11df2ce40",
  "blockNumber": "0x5",
  "gasUsed": "0x8911",
  "effectiveGasPrice": "0x234d292b",
  "blobGasPrice": "0x1",
  "from": "0x3c44cdddb6a900fa2b585dd299e03d12fa4293bc",
  "to": "0x5fbdb2315678afecb367f032d93f642f64180aa3",
  "contractAddress": null
}```
